#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
#define fo(i,n) for(int i=0;i<(n);i++)
#define MOD 1000000007
#define PB push_back
typedef long long ll;

int N, M, mn, mx;

int main () {
        scanf("%d %d", &N, &M);
        fo(i, N) {
                mn = 2e9;
                fo(j, M) {
                        int x; scanf("%d", &x);
                        mn = min(mn, x);
                }
                mx = max(mx, mn);
        }
        printf("%d\n", mx);
        return 0;
}
